title: US House lawmakers probe Delta Air Lines on use of AI in ticket pricing
description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A group of two dozen U.S. House Democratic lawmakers asked Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian on Wednesday to answer questions about whether it will use generative artificial intelligence to help set ticket prices.
content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A group of two dozen U.S. House Democratic lawmakers asked Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian on Wednesday to answer questions about whether it will use generative artificial intelligence to help set ticket prices.

title: 'Tutors' at Musk startup xAI had to give up rights to faces, voices to train sexy AI bots: report
description: Employees at Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI reportedly had to sign away the rights to their own faces and voices to help train the company's next generation of chatbots -- including a sexually suggestive virtual companion named "Ani."

title: Global Bond Binge Lifts Sales to Record $5.94 Trillion This Year

title: Freshworks expects strong fourth-quarter revenue on AI-driven software demand
description: Freshworks forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on growing demand for its artificial intelligence-powered software tools.
content:
The company expects fourth-quarter revenue of $217 million to $220 million, a midpoint that is above analysts' average estimate of $216.5 million, according to LSEG data.

title: Microsoft apologises for AI confusion, offers refunds
description: A tech giant will offer refunds to millions of its Australian users over what it calls unclear pricing for access to its artificial intelligence tool.
content:
Almost three million Australians will be offered refunds after a tech giant apologised for the way it charged customers to access its artificial intelligence tools.

title: One of The Short Sellers Who Predicted The 2008 Housing Crisis Now Looks to Be Betting Against AI
description: Michael Burry, an investor made famous by his bets against the U.S. housing market before the 2008-2009 crash who was portrayed by Christian Bale in 2015's The Big Short, appears to have a new short target: the artificial intelligence industry.
content:

title: Artificial intelligence won’t replace designers; it will supercharge them
description: Bengaluru: My 14-year-old niece wants to study design. By the time she graduates, AI will reshape the job market—and design looks especially exposed. .
